title: october 21: good times at the guggenheim
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia travels back to the beginning of a spectacular museum and architectural marvel—the Guggenheim Museum in Manhattan. Her music fact is about the humble beginnings of a different type of artist, the first album of an iconic musician. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
